summary: A princess whose country has been invaded goes into hiding in Louisiana, where she has to learn to act like an ordinary teenager.
cast: Demi Lovato|Selena Gomez|Nicholas Braun|Molly Hagan|Johnny Ray Rodriguez|Jamie Chung|Samantha Droke|Robert Adamson|Kevin G. Schmidt|Dale Dickey|Sully Diaz|Tom Verica|Jessenia Da Silva|Ángel Vázquez|Ricardo Alvarez|Brian Tester|Cristina Soler|Magda Rodriguez|Talia Rothenberg|Ramon Saldana|Eitan Bender|Sam Richardson|Isaac Santiago|Keshava John Rossi|Eldim Correa|Harrison Hapin|Madison De La Garza|Jeff Garlin|Marcella Lentz-Pope|India Oxenberg|Ishah Laurah Wright
title: Programa de protección de princesas
